overview:
Chris Broderick joined GroupLogic as Chief Executive Officer (CEO) in March of 2010. He is responsible for leading the company’s strategic growth, and operational initiatives to ensure GroupLogic delivers competitive, high value software solutions for its customers and its partners. As a software industry veteran, Broderick brings over fifteen years of executive leadership in the areas of IT security, identity, storage, and infrastructure management to GroupLogic.

Broderick was formerly CEO of CoreStreet, a firm specializing in converged security software, which was acquired by ActivIdentity in December of 2009. Prior to joining CoreStreet, Broderick acted as Senior Vice President and General Manager of CA’s (NYSE: CA) $500 million storage management business unit. Broderick also served as Senior Vice President and General Manager for CA’s North American Consulting Business, a $125M unit.
